org.coniks.coniks_server

Class ServerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_server.ServerConfig

  • public class ServerConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Sets various configuration parameters for a ConiksServer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int EPOCH_INTERVAL
      The time interval between epochs in milliseconds
      java.lang.String FULL_NAME
      The server's full hostname (can also be an IP address)
      java.lang.String KEYSTORE_PATH
      The path to the server's private key store
      java.lang.String KEYSTORE_PWD
      The password to the server's private key store
      java.lang.String MSGHAND_LOG_PATH
      The path to the server's message handler log
      java.lang.String NAME
      A short name for the server (e.g.
      int PORT
      The port number on which the CONIKS server is listening
      java.lang.String SERVER_LOG_PATH
      The path to the server's main log
      long STARTUP_TIME
      The UNIX epoch time at which this instance of the server was started up.
      java.lang.String TIMER_LOG_PATH
      The path to the server's epoch timer log
      java.lang.String TRUSTSTORE_PATH
      The path to the server's trusted certificate store
      java.lang.String TRUSTSTORE_PWD
      The password to the server's trusted certificate store

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerConfig()
      Set a ConiksServer's configuration according to the following default parameters.
      ServerConfig(java.lang.String configFile)
      Set a ConiksServer's configuration according to the parameters in configFile.

    • Field Detail

      • PORT

        public int PORT
        The port number on which the CONIKS server is listening

      • NAME

        public java.lang.String NAME
        A short name for the server (e.g. an alias used when generating certificates for this server

      • FULL_NAME

        public java.lang.String FULL_NAME
        The server's full hostname (can also be an IP address)

      • MSGHAND_LOG_PATH

        public java.lang.String MSGHAND_LOG_PATH
        The path to the server's message handler log

      • TIMER_LOG_PATH

        public java.lang.String TIMER_LOG_PATH
        The path to the server's epoch timer log

      • SERVER_LOG_PATH

        public java.lang.String SERVER_LOG_PATH
        The path to the server's main log

      • EPOCH_INTERVAL

        public int EPOCH_INTERVAL
        The time interval between epochs in milliseconds

      • KEYSTORE_PATH

        public java.lang.String KEYSTORE_PATH
        The path to the server's private key store

      • KEYSTORE_PWD

        public java.lang.String KEYSTORE_PWD
        The password to the server's private key store

      • TRUSTSTORE_PATH

        public java.lang.String TRUSTSTORE_PATH
        The path to the server's trusted certificate store

      • TRUSTSTORE_PWD

        public java.lang.String TRUSTSTORE_PWD
        The password to the server's trusted certificate store

      • STARTUP_TIME

        public long STARTUP_TIME
        The UNIX epoch time at which this instance of the server was started up. This is used as the starting point for "counting" epochs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerConfig

        public ServerConfig()
        Set a ConiksServer's configuration according to the following default parameters.

      • ServerConfig

        public ServerConfig(java.lang.String configFile)
        Set a ConiksServer's configuration according to the parameters in configFile. To avoid problems in case of an Exception, this constructor will first set the configuration to the specified default values from the first constructor.
